snippet: The convoy is billed as a “peace march” to demand an end to American drone strikes, which opponents say kill innocent civilians and breed militancy.
abstract: Hundreds of political activists in Pakistan, led by opposition politician Imran Khan and accompanied by 32 American peace activists, depart Islamabad in convoy and head toward country's tribal region to protest American drone strikes.
lead_paragraph: The convoy is billed as a “peace march” to demand an end to American drone strikes, which opponents say kill innocent civilians and breed militancy.

headline.seo: Americans Join Pakistan Convoy to Protest Drone Strikes
headline.main: Americans Join Pakistan Convoy to Protest Drone Strikes
headline.print_headline: Americans Join Pakistan Convoy to Protest Drone Strikes
